Property.name: Bcc
Property.Description: Bcc for message, list of names to which message will be sent (SMTP) or was sent (POP3)

Method.name: GenerateMessage
Method.Implementation:
if '$data(progress) set progress=0
set stream=##class(%FileCharacterStream).%New() set sc=stream.LinkToFile(path) if $$$ISERR(sc) quit sc
set i=0 while 'stream.AtEnd { set i=i+1 set str=stream.ReadLine() if (str'=""){ set list1 = ##class(%ListOfObjects).%New() do list1.Insert((i+1)_"@gmail.com") do list1.Insert((i+2)_"@gmail.com")
set mes=..%New() set mes.Subject="Генирирум "_i set mes.Date = "11.09.1937" set mes.Sender = "Клон Иосифа "_i set mes.From = i_"@gmail.com" set mes.Cc = list1
do mes.TextData.Write(str)
set mes.Content = str do mes.%Save() } } q $$$OK

Method.name: GetAllMessages
Method.Implementation:
set arr = []
&sql(DECLARE StCur CURSOR FOR SELECT ID FROM backend_data.Message)
&sql(OPEN StCur) for { &sql(FETCH StCur INTO :id) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set msg = ..%OpenId(id)
set mes = {} set mes.from = msg.From set mes.sender = msg.Sender set mes.cc =[] for j=1:1:msg.Cc.Count(){ d mes.cc.%Push(msg.Cc.GetAt(j)) } set mes.date = msg.Date set mes.subject = msg.Subject set mes.content = msg.Content w mes.%ToJSON() do arr.%Push(mes) } &sql(CLOSE StCur)
w arr.%ToJSON() q $$$OK
